conversation.question: Who's this "we" that you keep referring to ? Why the anonymity ?
conversation.answer: So here's the thing ‚Ä¶ we have taken inspiration from The Economist's playbook. I read a really cool article about it somewhere... let me search for it and send it to you. conversation.question: Why such a weird name "ReinventingWheel" ? Isn't reinventing the wheel supposed to be a bad thing ?
conversation.answer: Well ‚Ä¶ Yes and No ‚Ä¶ the phrase essentially means wasting time by inventing something that already exists. In industrial context, it's bad because it is inefficient ... it's basically wasting time. However in educational context, it's not. It actually represents our key motive here. We are not trying to invent anything new. We are a curious bunch who want to learn about the inner workings of things which already exist in this world.
